Bosch to enter production of SiC power semiconductors

The automotive supplier Bosch plans to use more efficient power semiconductors to extend the range of electric vehicles. The range is still one of the biggest obstacles for customers before buying an electric vehicle. The automotive supplier Bosch now intends to counteract this with the use...

Yangzhong, a beautiful city in China!

Yangzhong is located in the heart of the east Zhenjiang City, middle and lower reaches of the Yangze River. The northeast part faces Taizhou and Yangzhou across the river, and the southwest part is close to Zhenjiang and Changzhou. The south bridge connects Shanghai-Nanjing Highway and Beijing-Shanghai Railway, the North part is connected to Beijing-Shanghai Highway. It only takes about 2.5 hours to get to Shanghai Pudong International Airport, and 1.5 hours to Nanjing Lukou International Airport...

CREE Investing $1 B In North Carolina

Cree, Inc. will invest up to $1 billion in the expansion of its silicon carbide capacity with the development of a state-of-the-art, automated 200mm silicon carbide fabrication facility and a materials mega factory at its U.S. campus headquarters in Durham, NC. The investment is part of the company’s long-term growth strategy, and marks its largest investment to date in fueling its Wolfspeed silicon carbide and GaN on silicon carbide business...

ST Microelectronics Bets on SiC.

Silicon Carbide (SiC) is a wide bandgap (WBG) material that has advantages when compared to silicon (Figure 1). For the same die size and thickness, WBG devices provide higher breakdown voltage, current, operating temperature, and switching speed; and lower switching loss over Si devices. One of the main advantages of SiC devices is its capability to operate at high temperatures. When a power chip can operate at high temperature, the cooling cost can be reduced...

Overview of Power Semiconductor Devices

Power Semiconductor Device is also called Power Electronic Device. In 1940, when Bell Labs researched the radar detection rectifier, it was found that silicon has a PN junction effect. In 1958, GE developed the world’s first general thyristor for industrial use, making the birth of power electronics technology...

New 3rd Generation WBG Power Semiconductor

Semiland “The New 3rd Generation WBG Power Semiconductor SiC Power Module Packaging and System Integration Technologies” was selected as the “Jinshan Talent” program in Zhenjiang
